titles.title: To extend the suspension of duty on certain diamond tool and drill blanks, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/10/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the suspension of duty on certain diamond tool and drill blanks.
